description: '''ST12''' is an Indonesian band formed in [[Bandung]], [[West Java]], in 20 January 2004. The group was formed by [[Ilham Febry]], a.k.a. Pepep (drummer), Dedy Sudrajat, alias Pepeng (guitarist), Charly van Houten, a.k.a. Charly (vocalist), and Iman Rush (guitarist). ST12 stands for ''Jl. Stasiun Timur No. 12'', which was the band's headquarter. As of 2010, ST12 had produced five albums.
